targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_RAIN_HOUR")
  |> yield(name: "rain")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_WIND_SPEED")
  |> yield(name: "wind_speed")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "safe")
  |> yield(name: "safe")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_TEMPERATURE")
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_WIND_GUST")
  |> yield(name: "rain")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_RAIN_HOUR")
  |> yield(name: "wind_speed")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_TEMPERATURE")
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "WEATHER_WIND_SPEED")
  |> yield(name: "wind_speed")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "state")
  |> yield(name: "state")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "state")
  |> yield(name: "state")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_guiding_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "state")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_guiding_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "state")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_guiding")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["HFD", "AvgDist", "SNR"]))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_guiding")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["RADistanceRaw", "DECDistanceRaw"]))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start:-4w, stop:now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_field")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "name")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start:-1w, stop:now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_broker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "data")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start:-1w, stop:now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_observatory_field")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "name")
